title: Toshiba Looks to Split Two Ways Instead of Three
sub_head: Conglomerate, facing shareholder blowback, says it wants to spin off its device business
body:
TOKYOâ€” Toshiba Corp. revised its restructuring plan and said it wants to split into two parts instead of three, hoping to end a fight with foreign shareholders.
The Japanese conglomerate said Monday that under the revised plan, it would spin off its device business, which makes power semiconductors that have been sought-after during pandemic-era supply crunches. It said it aims to complete the split by March 2024.
